timeline.bodyText: This is not equivalent. Is it what you wanted to do? It is strange to find a ShuntContingency in GeneratorContingencyTest
timeline.author: mathbagu

timeline.bodyText: I don't understand why you change this test. None of these changes have been introduced in #925
timeline.author: mathbagu

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if for empty contingency we could leave with new Contingency
timeline.author: mathbagu

timeline.message:
